description: Check the current status of the OpenProject integration. Monitor health to ensure reliable workflows. Use status checks to troubleshoot issues quickly.

OPENPROJECT_BASE_URL.description: The base URL of your OpenProject instance

capabilities.name: get_project_work_packages
capabilities.description:
Get work packages for a specific project with status filtering

Args:
    project_id: The ID of the project
    status_filter: Status filter - 'open' for open work packages, 'all' for all

capabilities.name: get_overdue_work_packages
capabilities.description:
Get work packages that are due within specified days

Args:
    days_ahead: Number of days ahead to check for due work packages

capabilities.name: get_user_info
capabilities.description:
Get detailed information about a specific user

Args:
    user_id: The ID of the user
